MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH46 postcode area of Wirral, affecting properties Wimbrick Close, Wimbrick Hey and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:04AM. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 09:15AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 06:46AM on 2nd November 2020
